ideas.title: Bogan Barbie goes to the Cup
ideas.premise: A Barbie doll, dressed in typical gaudy Cup attire (think leopard print and fascinator), yells, "Good on ya, Half Yours! That's half mine now!" while clutching a wad of cash.
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at the perceived tackiness of some Cup attendees and gambling culture.

ideas.title: The Flemington Feng Shui Disaster
ideas.premise: A frazzled feng shui consultant is shown amidst the post-race chaos at Flemington, surrounded by bewildered racegoers, exclaiming, "No wonder Half Yours won! My calculations were off!"
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposes a serious practice with the unpredictable nature of horse racing.

ideas.title: Jamie's 'Double' Meaning
ideas.premise: Jamie Melham is shown holding two Melbourne Cups, while a waiter asks, "Congratulations! Can I get you a double of something to celebrate?", implying she's pregnant.
ideas.why_funny: Plays on the word 'double' and misinterprets her achievement comically.

ideas.title: Bureau of Meteorology's Tip
ideas.premise: The Bureau of Meteorology issues a weather report: "Cloudy with a chance of champagne showers, especially if you bet on Half Yours."
ideas.why_funny: Combines dry Aussie weather reporting with the excitement of winning the Cup.

ideas.title: Myki Card Mishap
ideas.premise: A racegoer, dressed to the nines, is stuck at a Myki barrier at Flinders Street Station, frantically trying to top up their card with winnings after betting on Half Yours.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable Melbourne public transport struggles despite the high-society event.
